---
title: "Wildfire Risk"
output: html_document
---

Read boundary files
```{r}
#unzip(zipfile = here::here("Data", "Census_Reference_Data_Shapefiles.zip"),
#      exdir = here::here("Data"))

WildfireRisk.sf <- sf::st_read(dsn = here::here("Data", "County.shp")) |>
  dplyr::filter(STATEFP == "12") |>
  dplyr::filter(FIPS %in% c(12063, 12013, 12077, 12045, 12037, 12129, 12073, 12039, 12065, 12079, 12123)) |>
  dplyr::mutate(fips = as.character(FIPS))
  
plot(WildfireRisk.sf$geometry)
```

Read summary files
```{r}
df <- readr::read_csv(here::here("Data", "fsf_fire_zcta_summary.csv")) 

WildfireRisk.sf <- WildfireRisk.sf |>
  dplyr::left_join(df)
```

```{r}
library(tmap)

tm_shape(WildfireRisk.sf) +
  tm_polygons("count_property")
```
